CRITICAL-PIERCING-1-TEXT: Double damage, the target's land speed is halved and can't swim for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-2-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-3-TEXT: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 × 5 feet directly away.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-4-TEXT: Normal damage and target takes 1d4 %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% of your choice.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-5-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-6-TEXT: Triple damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-7-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1 minute (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-8-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-9-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages% (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-10-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-11-TEXT: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-12-TEXT: Double damage and one arm cannot move (DC 15 Str or Medicine to be freed).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-13-TEXT: Double damage and target begins to drown 3 round later. DC 15 Con saving throw save each round to end effect.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-15-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. -4 penalty on all rolls using that hand %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-16-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 2 stages%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-18-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1d6 rounds (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Str saving throw save% each round to act).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-19-TEXT: Double damage and ignore damage resistance against bludgeoning, piercing and slashing.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-20-TEXT: Double damage and target %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 2d4 round (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-21-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-DEX=Dex% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target's speeds are reduced by half %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-22-TEXT: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves and ability checks for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-23-TEXT: Double damage to target and normal damage to adjacent target.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-24-TEXT: Double damage and target is knocked %STATUS-PRONE=prone%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-25-TEXT: Double damage and target is poisoned (treat as Oil of Taggit - SRD 209).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-26-TEXT: Double damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% if it was from ranged attack.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-27-TEXT: Normal damage and the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%. For the next 1d4 rounds, when casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-29-TEXT: Double damage, the target can't take reactions and can only perform an action or a move in the next round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-30-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-INCAPACITATED=incapacitated% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-31-TEXT: Normal damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. Target does not heal this damage naturally.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-33-TEXT: Double damage and target contracts Sewer Plague (%SAVE-CRITICAL=Con saving throw negates%. SRD 204).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-34-TEXT: Normal damage and target provokes opportunity attacks from all threatening opponents.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-35-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% for 1 round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-36-TEXT: Triple damage and 1d2 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration. The target has disadvantage on Perception and ranged attacks %UNTIL-HEALED=until healed%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-37-TEXT: Double damage and target has 1 item disarmed.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-38-TEXT: Normal damage, the target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage% and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction% that only be healed with Greater Restoration.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-39-TEXT: Double damage and one free attack against the target with disadvantage.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-41-TEXT: Double damage and target is %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-42-TEXT: Normal damage and 1 %ABILITY-CON=Con% %ABILITY-REDUCTION=ability reduction%. The next time he casts a verbal spell rolls 1d20: 1-10: the spell is lost. 11-20 the spell is cast.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-44-TEXT: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-45-TEXT: Double damage and target drops 1 item being held.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-47-TEXT: Double damage and target cannot move (DC 15 Str check negates).
CRITICAL-PIERCING-48-TEXT: Double damage and +2 to your AC for 1 round.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-49-TEXT: Normal damage, the target has disadvantage on %ABILITY-INT=Intelligence% checks and are %STATUS-EXHAUSTED=exhausted by 1 stage%.
CRITICAL-PIERCING-51-TEXT: Normal damage and target is %STATUS-POISONED=poisoned% for 1d6 rounds.
